title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-2.5 - Transfer, segregation and investment of reserve
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-2.5 - Transfer, segregation and investment of reserve

State Regulations

At the end of each calendar quarter, the provision for
vacancy and collection losses, if any, as computed in accordance with
subdivision (a) of section 1647- 2.4, shall be transferred from the
administration fund to the reserve fund. If the reserve is to be drawn upon, a
transfer of the amount to be drawn, as computed in accordance with subdivision
(b) of section
1647-2.4, shall, similarly, be made
from the reserve fund to the administration fund. The segregation and
investment of the reserve are discussed in Subpart 1647-5, to which reference
should be made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1647-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
